name: Buddy McLean
description: Stand Summon: **American Pie**. When I am played, choose 2 enemy cards on the field to silence. If there are less than 2 cards to silence, deal 5 damage to the enemy world instead
footer: Ceilings are weird, y'know? They only act to limit us, and stop us from taking flight, and seeing the stars.

stand.name: American Pie
stand.description: Every time an enemy card is silenced, deal 1 damage to a random enemy. This damage is increased by 1 every time an enemy card is silenced

name: Repugnans Fabula
description: Stand Summon: **Paradox**. When I am played, choose an enemy card on the field to paradoxify. If it is already paradoxified, afflict it with a random paradox. All paradoxes last 1 additional turn.

stand.name: Paradox
stand.description: Whenever an enemy card gets afflicted with a paradox. Make the paradox trigger a second different paradox.

name: Catastrophe
description: Whenever an enemy attacks or targets an ally card, it has a 50% chance of targeting a random enemy instead. If there are no enemies, it targets itself.

name: Rook
description: Stand Summon: **Merrie Melodies**. When I am hit or attack an enemy for the first time, transform me into 'Ricky Rat'.

stand.name: Merrie Melodies
stand.description: Whenever I am summoned, equip me with a random weapon and add a random card from the enemy's deck to your hand. All cards that you generate cost 1 less gold.

generatedCharacters.name: Ricky Rat
generatedCharacters.description: Stand Summon: **Merrie Melodies**. When I am defeated, create a 'Rook' in your hand.

stand.name: Merrie Melodies
stand.description: Whenever I am summoned, equip me with a random weapon and get a random card from either the enemy's or your deck. All cards that you generate cost 1 less gold.

name: Tyler Wolfe
description: Stand: **See You Again**. When I am played, choose an enemy with equal or less attack than me to store inside a card. When I am defeated, release the stored enemy.

stand.name: See You Again
stand.description: Store an enemy inside me

name: Tommy
description: If all of the 5 Horsemen have been summoned, I gain +5/+5 and all cards on the field, in your hand, and in your deck gain +5/+5.
footer: Ahh! Please don't fire me! I have to provide for...

name: Robert E. O. Speedwagon
description: Stand Summon: **Die Young**. When I am played, if your world is below 50% HP, equip me with Wild Child. If I am above 50% give me Kesha.
footer: The government shall pay... for my suffering!

stand.name: Die Young
stand.description: Whenever I am summoned, grant my user +1/+1 for each HP your world has lost this game.

equipment.name: Wild Child
equipment.description: When my wielder attacks, deal 1 damage to my world to deal 2 damage to the enemy getting attacked.

name: Garnet Speedwagon
description: If I survive for 5 turns, add 'Dionte' in your hand.
footer: 'What is your name? Jolene? That is a pretty name. I had a daugther with that name!' - <Redacted> Months/Years ago

name: Nic
description: Stand Suit: **Brittle Bones Nic**. When I am summoned, equip me with 'Mop'.
footer: While cleaning may look easy, it would be naive to think that it is always a simple task..

stand.name: Brittle Bones Nic
stand.description: Turn 'Mop' into 'Bone Club'.

equipment.name: Bone Club
equipment.description: The enemy whom I attacked gets stunned for 1 turn.

name: Niko Goluskey
description: Stand Summon: **Rasputin**. When I am summoned, choose 1 enemy card on the field to silence. If there are no cards to silence on the field, silence a card in the enemy's hand.
footer: ... What do you need this time?

stand.name: Rasputin
stand.description: Whenever I am summoned, show 2 random cards in the enemy's hand.

name: Darnell Webber
description: When I am summoned, equip me with the 'Tree-90'. If there is an enemy card on the field who is silenced, give me +2/+2.
footer: Shit! I will be late to my honey again!

equipment.name: Tree-90
equipment.description: Whenever my wielder attacks, stun a random enemy on the field for 1 turn.

name: Ace Nullman
description: Stand Summon: **American Boy**. Deal 2 damage to the enemy world for every enemy card which was silenced or revealed this game. If the enemy world has more than 0 hp, equip omnipotence.
footer: 'The mission is to kill those guys who went after Xeion and Cometon. If you fail, consider yourself --' Cuts off communication. 'You don't tell me what to do... Pretender'

stand.name: American Boy
stand.description: At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to all silenced enemies on the field

equipment.name: Omnipotence
equipment.description: Transform me into any equipment of your choice.

name: BB
description: Stand: **Fly Me to the Moon**. Game Start: Both players can have up to 8 cards on the field. When I am summoned, if have played 7 other cards this turn (making me the 8th!), give me infinite attack and health.
footer: 8. Such an interesting number. Wouldn't you say so... player?

stand.name: Fly Me to the Moon
stand.description: My user can move into any slot on the field at any point in time. (use the bb!bbMove command)

name: Danny
description: Stand Summon: **Locked out of Heaven**. **Liberation (5)**. Deal damage equal to my attack to all enemies.
footer: 'Woof!' - Danny said moments after feasting on a car engine.

stand.name: Locked out of Heaven
stand.description: Round End: Shuffle a Lock into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it deals 2 damage to all enemies.

generatedCharacters.name: Uptown Funk
generatedCharacters.description: Deal damage equal to my attack to all enemies. This repeats for the next 2 rounds.

name: Jolene Jones
description: Stand Summon: **The Scientist**.
footer: I will protect her from you. I will not fail her any more than I already have.

stand.name: The Scientist
stand.description: When I am summoned, make my user have 1 health for this turn. If they survive until the next turn, let them choose the perfect card to add to their hand.

name: Joy Jones
description: Stand Summon: **Eye of the Tiger**. If there is an enemy on the same position as me, grant that enemy -2 attack and -2 health.
footer: I must train harder. I must show her that I am strong enough to take care of myself!

stand.name: Eye of the Tiger
stand.description: If there is an enemy on the same position as me, grant me +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Ki Akihito
description: Stand Summon: **24-Hour Cinderella**. When I am summoned, equip me with the '宮本 武蔵(Miyamoto Musashi)'.
footer: Akihito! Get off your phone! .... Actually, never mind. I'll let Yui lecture you again :P

stand.name: 24-Hour Cinderella
stand.description: Round End: If you have 5 or less gold, generate a low cost spell. If you have 10 or less gold, generate a medium cost spell. If you have more than 10 gold, generate a high cost spell.

equipment.name: 宮本 武蔵(Miyamoto Musashi)
equipment.description: If my wielder is part of the verdant night give me +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Enrico Pucci
description: Stand Summon: **Made in Heaven**. When I am summoned, equip me with the 'Insert Arabic Named Weapon'.
footer: I am but a mere supporter of the spectacle that will be witnessed for the 50th time. Happy 50th anniversary... player.

stand.name: Made in Heaven
stand.description: Round End: Next 1 turn is skipped. This amount of turns skipped increases every 2 rounds.

equipment.name: Insert Arabic Named Weapon
equipment.description: If it is past turn 10, give me +6 attack and +6 health.

name: Mickey Bausse
description: Stand Summon: **Clubhouse**. When I am summoned, summon a 'Mouse Halal Guard' on the next 2 positions.
footer: I won't let your sacrifice go in vain... friend. I will take care of your family and community.

stand.name: Clubhouse
stand.description: Round End: Add a random Mouse Halal card to your hand.

name: Muhammed Hassan
description: Stand Summon: **Mirrors**.
footer: Please for the love of god shut up about my dad.

stand.name: Mirrors
stand.description: When I am summoned, deal damage to all enemies equal to their attack.

name: Dr. Wilson
description: Whenever I am damaged, deal 2 damage to the enemy with the lowest health. If there are no enemies, deal 3 damage to the enemy world
footer: Oh yes, that is the spot. OH YES! OH YES! OH YES! MAKE ME BLEED MORE!

name: Sabrina
description: Stand: **Devil Trigger**. I can attack any enemy on the enemy field. Every time I attack an enemy who is not on my position my attack action will not be used.
footer: PAXTON. YOU WILL PAYYYYYYYYYYYY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

stand.name: Devil Trigger
stand.description: Every time my user attacks and survives, give them +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Karolina Zeitmagier
description: Stand Summon: **Billie Jean**. When I am summoned, heal all allies and the allied World for all damage that was taken within the last 4 rounds. Round End: Heal all allies and the allied World for the damage taken last round.
footer: 'Billie Jean is not my lover. She's just a girl who claims that I am the one. But the kid is not my son' - Karolina sings happily while writing down some of her findings.

stand.name: Billie Jean
stand.description: Round Start and Summon: Summon a 'Zeit-Bombe' location on the enemy field.

generatedCards.name: Zeit-Bombe
generatedCards.description: Any enemy which is adjacent to me cannot attack this turn. Destroy me at the end of your turn.

name: Wilford Zeppeli
description: Stand: **Le Freak**. If there is an ally on the position before mine, feed them a random 'Soul Dish'.
footer: HOW MARVELOUS!!! I hope you enjoy my next dish!!!

stand.name: Le Freak
stand.description: Round End: Add a 'Soul Dish' to your hand.

generatedCards.name: Soul Dish
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to give them +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Grey Nullifer
description: Stand Summon: **Gangsta's Paradise**. Equalize my opponent's stats making them equal each other by reducing the higher stat by the difference.
footer: And when there is null, there is me... all alone.

stand.name: Gangsta's Paradise
stand.description: Summon and Round End: Nullify **ALL STANDS** on both fields

name: Essence of Delusion
description: Spend all of your gold to play me. When I am summoned, I gain attack and health for each gold spent.
footer: WE'VE DONE IT! WE HAVE SUCCESSFULLY MADE A VIAL OF D10! Wait... why is it moving...

name: Jameson J. Jonah
description: Stand: **Paparazzi**. **Liberation (10)**. When I am played, summon two 0 / 1 children.
footer: The younger... the better :)

stand.name: Paparazzi
stand.description: For every position taken on the allied field, reveal a card in the enemy hand.

name: Pretender
description: When I am summoned, transform me into another card of the same cost from your hand or deck. I gain its effects as well. When I am attacked, I explode, dealing 5 damage to the attacker and 1 damage to all other enemies.
footer: I am not who I seem to be. I am not who you think I am. I am not who you want me to be. I am not who you need me to be. But most importantly, I am not who I was.

name: Contradictory Soldier
description: When I strike an enemy, give them the paradox condition. If it is already paradoxified, afflict it with a random paradox.
footer: I am but a mere paradox... Kill me...

name: Kelly Shanks
description: Stand Equip: **GAS GAS GAS** (Sword Mode when enemy world is higher than 10 HP and Bike Mode when enemy world is less than or equal to 10 HP). When I am played, deal 1 damage to the enemy world.
footer: PEDAL TO THE METAL BABY!!!

stand.name: GAS GAS GAS
stand.description: I go into Sword Mode when enemy world is higher than 10 HP and Bike Mode when enemy world is less than or equal to 10 HP

mode.name: GAS GAS GAS (Bike Mode)
mode.description: When I am in this mode, whenever my wielder attacks, they attack all enemies and the enemy world.

mode.name: GAS GAS GAS (Sword Mode)
mode.description: When I am in this mode, whenever my wielder attacks, they deal 3 damage to the enemy world.
